heroicTraits.effect:
While this unit is within the combat range of a friendly non-HERO SKAVEN INFANTRY unit:

• This unit has WARD (4+).
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for this unit, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly non-HERO SKAVEN INFANTRY unit within this unit’s combat range after the damage sequence for this unit has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

heroicTraits.name: Short-tempered
heroicTraits.lore: This twitching and irascible Skaven has succeeded in making their minions more afraid of their displeasure than of the enemy.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for friendly SKAVEN units while they are wholly within 13" of this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Scurry Away
heroicTraits.lore: This Skaven chief does not think twice about scampering to safety when things look to be going south. Perhaps that’s why they have lived so long.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

heroicTraits.name: Fleshmeddler
heroicTraits.lore: This Skaven carries syringe darts filled with warpstone serum that can be fired into the patchwork hides of nearby Moulder creations to give them a ‘bit of extra bite’.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly MOULDER unit wholly within 13" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Pick 1 of the target’s melee weapons. Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of that weapon for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Devious Underling
heroicTraits.lore: Sly in the extreme, this ratman has mastered the art of biding his time, content to wait until his superiors’ demise before violently seizing control for himself.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick another friendly SKAVEN HERO on the battlefield with a Health characteristic that equals or exceeds this unit’s Health characteristic to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect:
For the rest of the battle:

• While the target has not been slain, friendly SKAVEN INFANTRY units have WARD (6+) while they are wholly within 13" of this unit.
• Once the target has been slain, add 2 to charge rolls for friendly SKAVEN INFANTRY units while they are wholly within 13" of this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Pit Tinkerer
heroicTraits.lore: This mechanically minded Skaven has a compulsion to make ‘improvements’ to the Skryre devices under his command.
heroicTraits.effect: You can re-roll the random characteristic rolls for the Move characteristic of friendly SKRYRE WAR MACHINES while they are wholly within 13" of this unit. In addition, each time a friendly SKRYRE WAR MACHINE wholly within 18" of this unit uses the ‘Rolling Doom’ or ‘Whirling Doom’ ability, add 1 to the amount of mortal damage inflicted, if any.

heroicTraits.name: Harbinger of the Great Ascendancy
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Start of Any Turn
heroicTraits.lore: In the eyes of this Skaven warlord, nothing can stop the Horned Rat's ascendancy and the ruination of the Mortal Realms.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is not in combat, you can use 2 different WARPSHATTER THROES abilities this turn instead of 1.

other.name: Hide-shelter!
other.lore: Volt-Klaw is insanely protective of his arsenal - afact that his long- suffering underlings use as an excuse to shelter behind sturdier weapons when needed.
other.effect: While a friendly VOLT-KLAW'S ENGINECOVEN INFANTRY unit is within the combat range of a friendly VOLT-KLAW'S ENGINECOVEN Ratling Warpblaster, it is not visible to enemy units more than 13" away.

other.name: Behold My Genius!
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Shooting Phase
other.lore: While setting Volt-Klaw's machines to maximum power quickly burns through their fuel, it also enhances their lethality to appalling levels.
other.declare: Pick all friendly VOLT-KLAW'S ENGINECOVEN units to be the targets.
other.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:

• Add 1 to hit rolls for the targets' shooting attacks.
• Add 3" to the Range characteristic of the targets' ranged weapons.

other.name: Skryre Payloads
other.lore: Krittok has made great effort to secure an arsenal of deadly Doom-Flayers, and he expects his minions to protect his investment with their lives.
other.effect: Friendly KRITTOK'S CLAWPACK Doom-Flayers units have WARD (5+) while they are within the combat range of a friendly KRITTOK'S CLAWPACK Stormvermin unit.

other.name: Always Three Clawsteps Ahead
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Hero Phase
other.lore: The best laid plans of the Skaven never go awry (or so they claim).
other.declare: Pick a friendly KRITTOK'S CLAWPACK unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
other.effect: That unit can use the 'Normal Move' ability as if it were your movement phase.

other.name: Fickle Motives
other.lore: Krittok has built his reputation on an impressive stack of victories, in part down to the ferocity of his Stormvermin elite and in part because of his willingness to cut his losses.
other.effect:
Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly KRITTOK'S CLAWPACK units while you have more victory points than your opponent.

Subtract 3 from the control scores of friendly KRITTOK'S CLAWPACK units while you have fewer victory points than your opponent.

battleTraits.name: Monstrous Entourage
battleTraits.lore: Thanquol is well practised in getting Moulder mutants to die on his behalf.
battleTraits.effect:
The Companion weapon ability has no effect on MUTATED MENAGERIE units. While a friendly Thanquol is within the combat range of another friendly Mutated Menagerie unit:

• That Thanquol has WARD (4+).
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for that Thanquol, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly MUTATED MENAGERIE unit within its combat range after the damage sequence has been resolved.

battleTraits.name: Rampaging Demise
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: Thanquol cares little for the survival of his beasts and is more than willing to have them sacrifice themselves in spasms of fury.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-HERO MUTATED MENAGERIE MONSTER unit that has not used any RAMPAGE abilities this turn to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect:
This unit has STRIKE-FIRST for the rest of the turn. However, at the end of the turn, this unit is destroyed. When this unit would be destroyed, before it is removed from play, roll a D3 for each enemy unit within 6" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

After this ability has been resolved, this unit cannot use any other RAMPAGE abilities for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Spiteful Swarms
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: Always one for a cunning trick, churning rat-swarms have been stitched into the guts of Thanquol's beasts, ready to burst free in a wave of disorienting fangs and claws when their host is slain.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-HERO MUTATED MENAGERIE MONSTER unit that has not used any RAMPAGE abilities this turn to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect:
This unit has STRIKE-FIRST for the rest of the turn. However, at the end of the turn, this unit is destroyed. When this unit would be destroyed, before it is removed from play, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 6" of this unit. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of that enemy unit's melee weapons for the rest of the battle.

After this ability has been resolved, this unit cannot use any other RAMPAGE abilities for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: More-more Mutation!
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: The sponsorship of a Grey Seer gives Thanquol's flesh-grafting lackeys licence to pursue their most deranged experiments.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-HERO MUTATED MENAGERIE unit to be the target. You cannot pick the same unit to be the target of this ability more than once per battle.
battleTraits.effect:
For the rest of the battle:

• Add 2 to the target's Health characteristic.
• Add 2" to the target's Move characteristic.
• Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target's melee weapons.
• The target has WARD (5+).
• At the end of each turn, allocate D3+2 damage points to the target.

battleTraits.name: Too Quick To Hit-hit
battleTraits.lore: These skittish ratmen dart and run in all directions, avoiding retribution as they flee from combat.
battleTraits.effect: No mortal damage is inflicted on friendly SKAVEN INFANTRY and CAVALRY units by RETREAT abilities.

battleTraits.name: Gnawhole Ambush
battleTraits.lore: Emerging from a green, glowing rift, the Skaventide pours onto the battlefield.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly SKAVEN unit that is in the tunnels below to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit wholly within 6" of a friendly Gnawhole and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Always Three Clawsteps Ahead
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: The best laid plans of the Skaven never go awry (or so they claim).
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-MONSTER SKAVEN unit that is not in combat and was not set up this turn to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: That unit can use the 'Normal Move' ability as if it were your movement phase.

battleTraits.name: The Lurking Vermintide
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly SKAVEN unit that has not been deployed.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit in reserve in the tunnels below. It has now been deployed.

battleTraits.name: Splinters of the Vermindoom
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round
battleTraits.lore: In the aftermath of the Vermindoom, reality continues to fracture and tear as gnawholes bore into reality, spewing forth endless tides of ratmen.
battleTraits.declare: You can use this ability if there are fewer than 3 friendly Gnawholes on the battlefield.
battleTraits.effect: Set up a Gnawhole on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units, more than 3" from all objectives and more than 1" from all other terrain features.

battleTraits.name: Disciples of Vizzik
battleTraits.lore: The clawpacks of the Great-grand Gnawhorde protect their daemon-prophet by any means necessary.
battleTraits.effect:
While a friendly Vizzik Skour is within the combat range of another friendly GNAWHORDE Unit:

• That Vizzik Skour has WARD (4+).
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for that Vizzik Skour, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly GNAWHORDE Unit within its combat range after the damage sequence has been resolved.

battleTraits.name: Frenzied Momentum
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.lore: Hateful bells clanging in their minds, the swarms of the Great-grand Gnawhorde surge into the fray.
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any WARPSHATTER THROES abilities this turn. Pick up to 3 friendly GNAWHORDE units to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

• Add 2 to run rolls and charge rolls for the targets.
• Subtract 1 from the targets' control scores.

battleTraits.name: Reckless Abandon
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: With the death frenzy upon them, the Gnawhorde's warriors show a most unusual disregard for self-preservation.
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any WARPSHATTER THROES abilities this turn. Pick up to 3 friendly GNAWHORDE units to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

• Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets' melee weapons.
• Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks that target those friendly units.

battleTraits.name: Unstoppable Warp-volley
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase
battleTraits.lore: The Warlocks of the Gnawhorde are no less aggressive than their Verminus kin - they are simply able to strike from further away.
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any WARPSHATTER THROES abilities this turn. Pick up to 3 friendly GNAWHORDE units to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

• Add 3" to the Range characteristic of the targets' ranged weapons.
• The targets cannot use commands.
